actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT Date_trunc('month', view_date)	AS timestamp, 
count(CASE WHEN view_date >= '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date - interval '1 month' 
  		AND view_date < '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date 
	  THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) as COUNT_CURRENT,
count(CASE WHEN view_date >= '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date - interval '2 month'
  		AND view_date < '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date - interval '1 month'
	  THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) as COUNT_Last	  
FROM public."smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq" WHERE
view_date >= '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date - interval '1 month'
  AND view_date < '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date AND 
name like {{Domain_select.selectedOptionValue ? Domain_select.selectedOptionValue : "%"}}
 GROUP BY
  timestamp
	order by timestamp desc
limit 2;
